casebody.data:
Gilberto GONZALEZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 22, 2017

Craig A. Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

James Ralls, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Gilberto Gonzalez' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 908, 153 A.3d 67 (2016), is denied.
